info.additionalInfo:
v0.56
- Fixed previous polls alt bg color.
v0.55
- Fixed dark [quote] borders.
- Yet another forums icons replacement. Now grey/black.
- Replaced hasposted icon.
v0.51
- Fixed Firefox overwritting forms styles.
- Replaced Disabled icons.
v0.5
- Fixed text color on input, select, textarea, button.
- Forum icons for unread topics from red>orange.
- Forum userinfo icon for Email added. (was a 404)
v0.45
- Fixed userinfo forum icons.
v0.4
- Fixed lists colors.
- Fixed icon colors.
v0.3
- Fixed mediainfo on description page.
- Fixed current page style on forums.
v0.2
- Added !important to all styles for Userscript support.
v0.1
- Initial Release.
